column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We were in Chicago for a one night stay for Â business and decided to search for the best steakhouse in town. I can say the other good reviews were spot on. We tried the crab cake
column3: creamed spinach and dry aged ribeye. Wow! The ribeye was melt-in-your-mouth delicious. The crab cake was big and not much filler. The atmosphere is not stuffy
column4: and just enough attentive without being overly in your face. The restaurant itself dimly lit. This is a great place for small groups
